title: RIOT PLEASE HELP
body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom
 please look at this, and what I posted i need help. I keep disconnecting and even after games I client crashes and cannot reopen LoL anymore.

replies.body:
I think they stopped checking that altogether a few months ago.

That command prompt ping is more for people who can't connect altogether, not for people who are experiencing disconnections during game-play. It does mean that it's not a DNS issue or anything.

Have you tried port-forwarding? If you don't know how or what it is at all, reply to this message. It's quite a lengthy explanation.

In the meantime, check out [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) and following through with the fixes there.

Best of luck.
